detectors.description: INT (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c32088cf2e82426e29b5e623082f7793114f1259_INT.sol#184-185) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:token.transfer(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c32088cf2e82426e29b5e623082f7793114f1259_INT.sol#58-60)
